20101223070057.000|20101223070059.000|CC1|THE ACCLAIMED NEW DISK IS

20101223070108.000|20101223070111.000|CC1|COMING UP RIGHT NOW.

20101223070114.000|20101223070114.000|CC1|>> I AM JAMES.                  
20101223070114.000|20101223070115.000|CC1|>> YES.                         
20101223070115.000|20101223070116.000|CC1|>> TO EVERYONE MAKING A         
20101223070116.000|20101223070117.000|CC1|DIFFERENCE --                   
20101223070117.000|20101223070119.000|CC1|>> YOU HELP US ALL LIVE BETTER. 
20101223070119.000|20101223070120.000|CC1|>> NATIONWIDE INSURANCE SUPPORTS
20101223070120.000|20101223070121.000|CC1|TAVIS SMILEY.                   
20101223070121.000|20101223070122.000|CC1|WITH EVERY QUESTION AND EVERY   
20101223070122.000|20101223070123.000|CC1|ANSWER, NATIONWIDE INSURANCE IS 
20101223070123.000|20101223070125.000|CC1|PROUD TO JOIN TAVIS IN WORKING  
20101223070125.000|20101223070128.000|CC1|TO IMPROVE FINANCIAL LITERACY   
20101223070128.000|20101223070129.000|CC1|AND REMOVE OBSTACLES TO ECONOMIC
20101223070129.000|20101223070130.000|CC1|EMPOWERMENT, ONE CONVERSATION AT
20101223070130.000|20101223070131.000|CC1|A TIME.                         
20101223070131.000|20101223070134.000|CC1|>> NATIONWIDE IS ON YOUR SIDE

20101223070135.000|20101223070137.000|CC1|PBS STATION FROM VIEWERS LIKE   
20101223070137.000|20101223070138.000|CC1|YOU.                            
20101223070138.000|20101223070203.000|CC1|THANK YOU.                      
20101223070203.000|20101223070205.000|CC1|FORMER HEAD OF COMMUNICATIONS   
20101223070205.000|20101223070206.000|CC1|FOR HEALTH INSURANCE GIANT      
20101223070206.000|20101223070208.000|CC1|CIGNA, WHO BLEW THE WHISTLE ON  
20101223070208.000|20101223070209.000|CC1|DECEPTIVE HEALTH INSURANCE      
20101223070209.000|20101223070210.000|CC1|PRACTICES.                      
20101223070210.000|20101223070212.000|CC1|HE IS A SENIOR FELLOW AT THE    
20101223070212.000|20101223070213.000|CC1|CENTER FOR MEDIA AND DEMOCRACY  
20101223070213.000|20101223070218.000|CC1|AND THE AUTHOR OF "DEADLY SPIN."
20101223070218.000|20101223070221.000|CC1|HE SPEAKS OUT ON HOW INSURANCE  
20101223070221.000|20101223070223.000|CC1|IS KILLING HEALTH CARE AND      
20101223070223.000|20101223070224.000|CC1|DECEIVING AMERICANS.            
20101223070224.000|20101223070226.000|CC1|YOU DO NOT HOLD BACK IN THE     
20101223070226.000|20101223070228.000|CC1|BOOK, AND YOU ARE BRUTALLY      
20101223070228.000|20101223070229.000|CC1|HONEST.                         
20101223070229.000|20101223070233.000|CC1|LET ME READ TWO SENTENCES.      
20101223070233.000|20101223070234.000|CC1|ABOUT 45,000 PEOPLE DIE IN      
20101223070234.000|20101223070236.000|CC1|AMERICA EVERY YEAR BECAUSE THEY 
20101223070236.000|20101223070238.000|CC1|HAVE NO HEALTH INSURANCE.       
20101223070238.000|20101223070239.000|CC1|I AM PARTLY RESPONSIBLE FOR SOME
20101223070239.000|20101223070242.000|CC1|OF THE DEATHS MAKING UP THAT    
20101223070242.000|20101223070242.000|CC1|SHAMEFUL STATISTIC.             
20101223070242.000|20101223070244.000|CC1|THAT IS HOW THE BOOK OPENS.     
20101223070244.000|20101223070245.000|CC1|>> IT IS.                       
20101223070245.000|20101223070247.000|CC1|I WANTED TO MAKE SURE PEOPLE    
20101223070247.000|20101223070249.000|CC1|UNDERSTOOD WE ARE TALKING ABOUT 
20101223070249.000|20101223070251.000|CC1|SPIN THAT IS REALLY DEADLY.     
20101223070251.000|20101223070253.000|CC1|WE ARE TALKING ABOUT HUMAN      
20101223070253.000|20101223070254.000|CC1|LIVES, PEOPLE DYING BECAUSE THEY
20101223070254.000|20101223070255.000|CC1|DO NOT HAVE ACCESS TO           
20101223070255.000|20101223070258.000|CC1|APPROPRIATE HEALTH CARE.        
20101223070258.000|20101223070300.000|CC1|TAVIS: EVERYBODY SPENDS, WITH   
20101223070300.000|20101223070302.000|CC1|ALL DUE RESPECT.                
20101223070302.000|20101223070302.000|CC1|CORPORATIONS PAID YOU TO DO     
20101223070302.000|20101223070303.000|CC1|THAT.                           
20101223070303.000|20101223070305.000|CC1|I THINK WE UNDERSTAND AND       
20101223070305.000|20101223070307.000|CC1|SOMEWHAT EXCEPT THAT.           
20101223070307.000|20101223070308.000|CC1|BUT WHY YOU SAY THE SPIN IS     
20101223070308.000|20101223070309.000|CC1|DEADLY?                         
20101223070309.000|20101223070311.000|CC1|THAT IS A SERIOUS ALLEGATION.   
20101223070311.000|20101223070312.000|CC1|>> IT IS.                       
20101223070312.000|20101223070315.000|CC1|BUT WE HAVE NOW IS AN INSURANCE 
20101223070315.000|20101223070316.000|CC1|SYSTEM DOMINATED BY BIG         
20101223070316.000|20101223070317.000|CC1|CORPORATIONS.                   
20101223070317.000|20101223070318.000|CC1|THEIR FIRST RELATIONSHIP IS WITH
20101223070318.000|20101223070320.000|CC1|WALL STREET AND THEIR INVESTORS.
20101223070320.000|20101223070321.000|CC1|THEY DO THINGS TO MAKE SURE THEY
20101223070321.000|20101223070324.000|CC1|ARE MAKING AN ADEQUATE PROFIT TO
20101223070324.000|20101223070325.000|CC1|SATISFY INVESTORS.              
20101223070325.000|20101223070327.000|CC1|THOSE PRACTICES THEY ENGAGE IN  
20101223070327.000|20101223070328.000|CC1|ARE REALLY CAUSING MORE AND MORE
20101223070328.000|20101223070330.000|CC1|PEOPLE TO BE UNINSURED, AND MORE
20101223070330.000|20101223070333.000|CC1|PEOPLE TO BE UNDERINSURED.      
20101223070333.000|20101223070334.000|CC1|THIS IS RESULTING DIRECTLY IN   
20101223070334.000|20101223070336.000|CC1|PEOPLE LOSING THEIR LIVES.      
20101223070336.000|20101223070338.000|CC1|SO IT IS DEADLY.                
20101223070338.000|20101223070340.000|CC1|TAVIS: PEOPLE LOSING THEIR LIVES
20101223070340.000|20101223070343.000|CC1|-- IS THERE ANY CASE THAT       
20101223070343.000|20101223070344.000|CC1|DISRUPTED YOUR SPIRIT MORE THAN 
20101223070344.000|20101223070349.000|CC1|THE CASE OF NADALINE?           
20101223070349.000|20101223070350.000|CC1|FOR THOSE OF YOU WHO DO NOT     
20101223070350.000|20101223070352.000|CC1|REMEMBER OR DID NOT HEAR ABOUT  
20101223070352.000|20101223070353.000|CC1|IT, I WILL LET YOU TELL THE     
20101223070353.000|20101223070354.000|CC1|STORY.                          
20101223070354.000|20101223070355.000|CC1|THEN THE AUDIENCE WILL          
20101223070355.000|20101223070357.000|CC1|UNDERSTAND WHY I ASKED IF THERE 
20101223070357.000|20101223070358.000|CC1|WAS DISRUPTIVE TO YOUR SPIRIT.  
20101223070358.000|20101223070400.000|CC1|>> IT WAS VERY DISRUPTIVE.      
20101223070400.000|20101223070402.000|CC1|IT WAS THE CASE THAT MADE ME    
20101223070402.000|20101223070403.000|CC1|DECIDE I WAS IN THE WRONG LINE  
20101223070403.000|20101223070404.000|CC1|OF BUSINESS.                    
20101223070404.000|20101223070406.000|CC1|I LEFT MY JOB WEEKS AFTER THIS. 
20101223070406.000|20101223070409.000|CC1|SHE WAS A YOUNG WOMAN WHO WAS 17
20101223070409.000|20101223070410.000|CC1|YEARS OLD.                      
20101223070410.000|20101223070412.000|CC1|SHE LIVED IN LOS ANGELES.       
20101223070412.000|20101223070413.000|CC1|HER DOCTORS SAID SHE NEEDED A   
20101223070413.000|20101223070414.000|CC1|LIVER TRANSPLANT.               
20101223070414.000|20101223070417.000|CC1|SHE HAD HAD LEUKEMIA A FEW YEARS
20101223070417.000|20101223070417.000|CC1|EARLIER.                        
20101223070417.000|20101223070419.000|CC1|IT CAME BACK.                   
20101223070419.000|20101223070421.000|CC1|THE DOCTORS IN PHILADELPHIA,    
20101223070421.000|20101223070423.000|CC1|ACTUALLY IN PITTSBURGH, WHERE   
20101223070423.000|20101223070425.000|CC1|CIGNA'S TRANSPLANT OFFICES ARE  
20101223070425.000|20101223070426.000|CC1|LOCATED, SAID NO.               
20101223070426.000|20101223070427.000|CC1|SHE WAS NOT GOING TO BE         
20101223070427.000|20101223070430.000|CC1|AUTHORIZED TO BE COVERED FOR A  
20101223070430.000|20101223070431.000|CC1|TRANSPLANT, EVEN THOUGH HER     
20101223070431.000|20101223070432.000|CC1|BENEFIT PLANS SAID IT WOULD BE  
20101223070432.000|20101223070433.000|CC1|COVERED.                        
20101223070433.000|20101223070435.000|CC1|HER DOCTORS SAID SCHIFF -- THAT 
20101223070435.000|20101223070437.000|CC1|IF SHE GOT THIS TRANSPLANT SHE  
20101223070437.000|20101223070439.000|CC1|HAD A 65% CHANCE OF LIVING AT   
20101223070439.000|20101223070442.000|CC1|LEAST FIVE YEARS, MAYBE LONGER. 
20101223070442.000|20101223070443.000|CC1|A DOCTOR TO THOUSAND MILES AWAY,
20101223070443.000|20101223070445.000|CC1|WORKING FOR THE BIG CORPORATION 
20101223070445.000|20101223070448.000|CC1|I WAS, SAID THAT IN HIS OPINION 
20101223070448.000|20101223070449.000|CC1|IT WAS EXPERIMENTAL AND HE WOULD
20101223070449.000|20101223070452.000|CC1|NOT PAY FOR IT.                 
20101223070452.000|20101223070455.000|CC1|AND REGRETTABLY, SHE DIED.      
20101223070455.000|20101223070458.000|CC1|THE REALITY IS THAT THE FAMILY  
20101223070458.000|20101223070500.000|CC1|WAS ABLE TO GET SOME MUCH PUBLIC
20101223070500.000|20101223070502.000|CC1|ATTENTION FOCUSED ON THIS CASE  
20101223070502.000|20101223070504.000|CC1|THAT THEY EVENTUALLY GOT CIGNA  
20101223070504.000|20101223070507.000|CC1|TO CHANGE ITS MIND.             
20101223070507.000|20101223070508.000|CC1|BECAUSE CIGNA DID NOT LIKE THE  
20101223070508.000|20101223070510.000|CC1|P.R. BLACK LIKE IT WAS GETTING, 
20101223070510.000|20101223070512.000|CC1|AND IT DID.                     
20101223070512.000|20101223070514.000|CC1|BUT THE PROBLEM WAS THE DECISION
20101223070514.000|20101223070516.000|CC1|TO COVER IT CAME JUST HOURS     
20101223070516.000|20101223070517.000|CC1|BEFORE SHE DIED.                
20101223070517.000|20101223070518.000|CC1|HER HEALTH HAD DETERIORATED SO  
20101223070518.000|20101223070520.000|CC1|MUCH DURING THIS TIME OF WAITING
20101223070520.000|20101223070523.000|CC1|FOR IT --                       
20101223070523.000|20101223070526.000|CC1|TAVIS: SIGNIFY GETS AROUND TO   
20101223070526.000|20101223070527.000|CC1|COVER IT, AND SHE IS DEAD.      
20101223070527.000|20101223070529.000|CC1|>> SHE WAS DEAD HOURS LATER.    
20101223070529.000|20101223070531.000|CC1|IT WAS DEVASTATING.             
20101223070531.000|20101223070534.000|CC1|TAVIS: AS A CORPORATION, WHAT   
20101223070534.000|20101223070535.000|CC1|HAPPENS WHEN AN INSURANCE       
20101223070535.000|20101223070537.000|CC1|COMPANY -- I RECALL THESE       
20101223070537.000|20101223070538.000|CC1|STORIES.                        
20101223070538.000|20101223070539.000|CC1|I TALKED TO MICHAEL MORE BEFORE 
20101223070539.000|20101223070541.000|CC1|HIS MOVIE CAME OUT, AND HE WAS  
20101223070541.000|20101223070543.000|CC1|SHARING STORIES ABOUT HOW PEOPLE
20101223070543.000|20101223070545.000|CC1|WERE RUNNING SCARED, KNOWING THE
20101223070545.000|20101223070547.000|CC1|FILM WAS ABOUT TO COME.         
20101223070547.000|20101223070549.000|CC1|WHAT HAPPENED INSIDE A HEALTH   
20101223070549.000|20101223070552.000|CC1|INSURER WHEN THEY HAVE A STORY  
20101223070552.000|20101223070555.000|CC1|LIKE THIS FACING THEM.          
20101223070555.000|20101223070557.000|CC1|WHAT HAPPENS INSIDE THE         
20101223070557.000|20101223070558.000|CC1|BOARDROOM?                      
20101223070558.000|20101223070600.000|CC1|>> RECALLED A HIGH-PROFILE CASE.
20101223070600.000|20101223070601.000|CC1|WHENEVER WE GET A CALL FROM THE 
20101223070601.000|20101223070604.000|CC1|MEDIA ABOUT SOMEONE IN THE MEDIA
20101223070604.000|20101223070607.000|CC1|-- ABOUT SOMEONE LIKE THIS, WE  
20101223070607.000|20101223070608.000|CC1|ELEVATED TO HIGH-PROFILE STATUS.
20101223070608.000|20101223070611.000|CC1|IN THIS CASE, WE WENT BACK ON   
20101223070611.000|20101223070611.000|CC1|WHAT WE DID.                    
20101223070611.000|20101223070613.000|CC1|I WOULD CONVENE A CONFERENCE    
20101223070613.000|20101223070615.000|CC1|CALL WITH PEOPLE TO DISCUSS     
20101223070615.000|20101223070615.000|CC1|THIS.                           
20101223070615.000|20101223070617.000|CC1|I WOULD MAKE SURE PEOPLE KNEW   
20101223070617.000|20101223070618.000|CC1|THE P.R. CONSEQUENCES OF        
20101223070618.000|20101223070620.000|CC1|CONTINUING WITH A CERTAIN       
20101223070620.000|20101223070620.000|CC1|DENIAL.                         
20101223070620.000|20101223070623.000|CC1|IT GETS A LOT OF ATTENTION      
20101223070623.000|20101223070624.000|CC1|WITHIN THE CORPORATION.         
20101223070624.000|20101223070626.000|CC1|AND OFTEN THE POWERS THAT BE    
20101223070626.000|20101223070627.000|CC1|WILL DECIDE IT IS MORE IMPORTANT
20101223070627.000|20101223070628.000|CC1|TO COVER SOMETHING THAT THEY    
20101223070628.000|20101223070630.000|CC1|HAVE DENIED RATHER THAN TO HAVE 
20101223070630.000|20101223070632.000|CC1|A STORY GO ON.                  
20101223070632.000|20101223070633.000|CC1|SOMETIMES, I WOULD BE ABLE TO   
20101223070633.000|20101223070637.000|CC1|KILL A STORY, PREVENTED FROM    
20101223070637.000|20101223070640.000|CC1|BEING ON THE AIR AT ALL, JUST BY
20101223070640.000|20101223070642.000|CC1|BRINGING THIS TO TOP EXECUTIVES.
20101223070642.000|20101223070645.000|CC1|TAVIS: IS THE CEO THE PERSON WHO
20101223070645.000|20101223070646.000|CC1|ULTIMATELY DECIDES WHETHER WE   
20101223070646.000|20101223070648.000|CC1|ARE GOING TO GO LEFT OR RIGHT   
20101223070648.000|20101223070649.000|CC1|WHEN WE GET TO A HIGH-PROFILE   
20101223070649.000|20101223070650.000|CC1|CASE?                           
20101223070650.000|20101223070652.000|CC1|>> IF IT IS A CASE LIKE THIS, IT
20101223070652.000|20101223070654.000|CC1|IS DECIDED AT THE TOP LEVEL.    
20101223070654.000|20101223070656.000|CC1|MY ADVICE TO ANYONE IS TO BE A  
20101223070656.000|20101223070658.000|CC1|SQUEAKY WHEEL.                  
20101223070658.000|20101223070701.000|CC1|UNFORTUNATELY FOR THEM, IT CAME 
20101223070701.000|20101223070701.000|CC1|TOO LATE.                       
20101223070701.000|20101223070703.000|CC1|BUT THE LOUDER YOU CAN BE, THE  
20101223070703.000|20101223070705.000|CC1|MORE ATTENTION YOU CAN GET ON   
20101223070705.000|20101223070706.000|CC1|YOUR CASE, THE MORE SUCCESS YOU 
20101223070706.000|20101223070709.000|CC1|WILL HAVE ANY MORE ASSURANCE THE
20101223070709.000|20101223070710.000|CC1|C.E.O. WILL GET PERSONALLY      
20101223070710.000|20101223070711.000|CC1|INVOLVED.                       
20101223070711.000|20101223070714.000|CC1|TAVIS: YOU WERE SPEAKING ON THIS
20101223070714.000|20101223070715.000|CC1|THREAT THE HEALTH-CARE DEBATE.  
20101223070715.000|20101223070717.000|CC1|WE WILL COME BACK TO THE FEDERAL
20101223070717.000|20101223070720.000|CC1|JUDGE'S DECISION IN A MOMENT.   
20101223070720.000|20101223070722.000|CC1|WHAT PART OF THE SPIN THAT WE   
20101223070722.000|20101223070723.000|CC1|HAVE BEEN GETTING AND CONTINUE  
20101223070723.000|20101223070726.000|CC1|TO GET FROM THE INSURANCE       
20101223070726.000|20101223070728.000|CC1|INDUSTRY SHOULD THE AMERICAN    
20101223070728.000|20101223070730.000|CC1|PEOPLE THE MOST SUSPICIOUS OF?  
20101223070730.000|20101223070731.000|CC1|>> THEY SHOULD BE SKEPTICAL OF  
20101223070731.000|20101223070733.000|CC1|ANYTHING THAT COMES FROM THE    
20101223070733.000|20101223070734.000|CC1|INSURANCE INDUSTRY OR THEIR     
20101223070734.000|20101223070737.000|CC1|ALLIES IN TERMS OF HOW THEY WILL
20101223070737.000|20101223070739.000|CC1|TAKE THE HEALTH CARE REFORM     
20101223070739.000|20101223070740.000|CC1|LEGISLATION.                    
20101223070740.000|20101223070741.000|CC1|WE HEAR THIS IS A GOVERNMENT    
20101223070741.000|20101223070744.000|CC1|TAKEOVER PEEPER -- TAKEOVER.    
20101223070744.000|20101223070745.000|CC1|PEOPLE NEED TO KNOW THIS IS A   
20101223070745.000|20101223070748.000|CC1|PHRASE THAT CAME STRAIGHT OUT OF
20101223070748.000|20101223070748.000|CC1|THE INSURANCE INDUSTRY.         
20101223070748.000|20101223070750.000|CC1|WE WANTED PEOPLE TO BE AFRAID OF
20101223070750.000|20101223070752.000|CC1|MORE GOVERNMENT INVOLVEMENT IN  
20101223070752.000|20101223070753.000|CC1|THE HEALTH-CARE SYSTEM.         
20101223070753.000|20101223070754.000|CC1|WE NEED THAT INVOLVEMENT.       
20101223070754.000|20101223070756.000|CC1|THEY DO NOT WANTED.             
20101223070756.000|20101223070758.000|CC1|THE SKEPTICAL OF PHRASES YOU    
20101223070758.000|20101223070801.000|CC1|HERE LIKE "DEATH PANELS."       
20101223070801.000|20101223070803.000|CC1|THAT WAS CREATED BY PEOPLE WHO  
20101223070803.000|20101223070804.000|CC1|ARE PURPOSELY MISLEADING PEOPLE.
20101223070804.000|20101223070806.000|CC1|THERE WAS NO SUCH THING IN THIS 
20101223070806.000|20101223070807.000|CC1|LEGISLATION.                    
20101223070807.000|20101223070809.000|CC1|DEATH PANELS DO EXIST IN THIS   
20101223070809.000|20101223070812.000|CC1|CURRENT SYSTEM, INSIDE BIG,     
20101223070812.000|20101223070813.000|CC1|CORPORATE-OWNED INSURANCE       
20101223070813.000|20101223070814.000|CC1|COMPANIES.                      
20101223070814.000|20101223070816.000|CC1|LIKE IN THIS CASE, A DOCTOR IS  
20101223070816.000|20101223070820.000|CC1|STANDING BETWEEN NADALINE AND
